org.openimaj.data.dataset

Class ReadableGroupDataset<KEY,DATASET extends Dataset<INSTANCE>,INSTANCE,SOURCE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<KEY,DATASET>
      • org.openimaj.data.dataset.ReadableGroupDataset<KEY,DATASET,INSTANCE,SOURCE>
  • Type Parameters:
    KEY - Type of dataset class key
    DATASET - Type of sub-datasets.
    INSTANCE - Type of instances in the dataset
    SOURCE - the type of object that provides the data to create the instance
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<INSTANCE>, Map<KEY,DATASET>, Dataset<INSTANCE>, GroupedDataset<KEY,DATASET,INSTANCE>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UKBenchGroupDataset, VFSGroupDataset

    public abstract class ReadableGroupDataset<KEY,DATASET extends Dataset<INSTANCE>,INSTANCE,SOURCE>
extends AbstractMap<KEY,DATASET>
implements GroupedDataset<KEY,DATASET,INSTANCE>
    Base class for GroupedDatasets in which each instance is read with an InputStreamObjectReader.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
